Is it possible to get "Free FPS" by offloading frame generation to your iGPU while your dedicated GPU handles the heavy lifting? Today, I’m testing a wild theory using Lossless Scaling on a Ryzen 7 8700G (Radeon 780M) paired with the Intel Arc Pro B50. This might be the best performance hack for Small Form Factor (SFF) PCs I have ever seen.

In this video, I’ll show you exactly how to route your display through the motherboard to force the iGPU to handle Frame Gen, leaving your dedicated graphics card free to render the game at native resolutions. We test this hybrid s
